name: Novocall Pte Ltd
description: Developer of web callback service platform intended to convert web visitors into call leads. The company's platform captures and distributes qualified sales call leads for inside sales and sales teams, enabling website visitors to request an instant callback from the company faster.
one_liner: Developer of web callback service platform intended to convert web visitors into call leads. The company's platform captures and distributes qualified sales call leads for inside sales and sales teams, enabling website visitors to request an instant callback from the company faster.
